name: Kids Chef - Rice Pudding
description: You have plans to visit your friend Ryan for a play-date, but little do you know that Ryan has planned a surprise for you. He wants to take a trip to the market to gather all of the necessary ingredients to prepare his favorite after-school snack, and then he wants to share the recipe with you. Cooking this delicious dish together sounds like fun! So grab your apron and get ready to put your culinary skills to the test in this fun cooking game for kids. Head over to the local grocery store and pick out all of the ingredients you'll need to prepare this dish. Once you have everything on the list, follow the instructions and stick to Ryan's recipe to concoct this delicious snack. Now that you've bonded over cooking, enjoy your sweet reward by snacking on the yummy rice pudding you made with your good friend!
